changeDice() - Method in class Cluedo.GUI.InfoPanel
Rolls two dice, updates the information panel to show what the dice rolled and then return the sum of the two numbers
CharacterSelection - Class in Cluedo.GUI
This class allows the user to select which characters within cluedo are playing in this game, once selection is complete the passed consumer is then run with the list of players.
